name: H2ONGER
description:
The game is in an early version of development, created by one person. In case of any problems, please report a bug using the in-game button or this link.

***All donations will be dedicated to game development and future projects.***

H2ONGER is an action adventure game set on an island from which all its inhabitants have mysteriously vanished. Discover the mysteries of the island thanks to strange power obtained during sleep.

The Plot
When you decided to go on an adventure, not everything went your way. On your way, you were hit by a powerful storm, and you had to change the direction of your trip. You began to wander lands shrouded in various tales of hunger, plagues, water shortage, and globalization. The storm didn't give up, and you passed out. During this time, you experience strange visions. You wake up on the coast of the island you decide to go to get materials for your onward journey. The island turns out to be uninhabited for a long time, and you experience strange abilities acquired during sleep that allow you to delve into the history of the island.

Fight
Various species of creatures and plants have taken over the island. Additionally, some of them are very aggressive and dangerous. Fight with your stick with light and heavy attacks. Additionally, perform throwing attacks or block damage. Your opponents sometimes have valuable items to drop.

Create, sell and buy items
Use the acquired items for crafting with a crafting table or cooking pot. You can also sell them to get currency, with which you can buy various items in the store.

***The pool of items in the current version is very limited.***

Discover the secrets of the island
Use your power to see fragments of memories of the former inhabitants of the island. Interact with them to conduct a dialogue.

Key Feature
- Stylized world
- Crafting system
- Colorfull island
- Fighting system
- Captivating story
- Atmospheric soundtrack

Your feedback really matters. If you have any suggestions for improving the game, please use the feedback option or write to me on discord Metros#6851 .
